metadata.dc:author: Rodríguez Palma, Manuel
López Casanova, Pablo
Malia Gázquez, Rosario
metadata.dc:description: Given the diversity of existing models of beds, combined with the difficulty of describing them all, in this article the authors will focus on providing the main characteristics and requirements which articulated beds should have in order for their use in hospitals, private homes or residences.
metadata.dc:title: Camas articuladas. Funciones y características.
[The functions and characteristics of articulated beds].
